item.title: Alterna Vvelt: Blue Exorcist Another Story for iOS, Android launches June 25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/alterna-vvelt-blue-exorcist-another-story-for-ios-android-launches-june-25

  • Smartphone

PC version not dated.

3D action RPG Alterna Vvelt: Blue Exorcist Another Story will launch for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on June 25, Aniplex announced. It will be available in the Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Philippines, Singapore, Spain, Thailand, the United Kingdom, and the United States. A release date for the PC version was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

“Show me… Show me a new story only you can create.”

Experience the world of the popular dark fantasy Blue Exorcist in a brand-new 3D action RPG!

Become an Exorcist and explore True Cross Academy Town!

So, what do you think? Care to take a journey?

Key Features

  • An Amazing Brand-New Story From the World of the Original Series – Featuring a fully-voiced main story. You are the main character of this tale!
  • Also Includes a Cast of New Faces – All new characters designed by Blue Exorcist‘s creator, Kazue Kato!
  • Immerse Yourself in the World of Blue Exorcist – Explore True Cross Academy Town from the original series! Become an Exorcist for the Knights of the True Cross and complete missions!
  • Eye-Popping 3D Action – Use your Skills and Arcana to create amazing action! Master the Demonic Elements and use them to your advantage in battle!
  • Utilize Multiplayer and Challenge Powerful Bosses – Work with your Friends and Guild Members to take down big enemies and missions!
  • Design Your Own Room – Interact with your friends and characters in-game! Customize your own space and visit other players’ rooms as well!
  • Incredible Voice Actors Bring the Story to Life! – Featuring Jun Fukuyama, Kana Hanazawa, Yuki Kaji, Tetsuya Kakihara, Hiroshi Kamiya, Eri Kitamura, Kazuya Nakai, Nobuhiko Okamoto, Ryotaro Okiayu, Rina Sato, Ayahi Takagaki, Kisho Taniyama, Koji Yusa, and more!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter character trailer – Joshua Bright
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/trails-in-the-sky-1st-chapter-character-trailer-joshua-bright

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

A boy burdened by an unknown past.

Falcom has released the second character trailer for Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter, introducing Joshua Bright.

Here is his official description:

A boy with jet-black hair and amber eyes, burdened by an unknown past.

A boy taken in by the Bright family five years ago. With jet-black hair and amber eyes, he always appears cool and composed. His hobbies include reading and playing the harmonica.

Highly intelligent and level-headed, he often finds himself supporting the impulsive Estelle, keeping her in check.

His past prior to his adoption remains a mystery. There are times when he seems lost in thought, and has a habit of demeaning himself.

Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 19 worldwide. Read more about the game here and here.

Watch the trailer below.

Character Trailer: Joshua Bright
